alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 11 at 12:29AM CST until December 11 at 1:15AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 115 AM CST FOR SOUTHERN GUADALUPE COUNTY... At 1229 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over New Berlin, or 8 miles southeast of Cibolo, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Seguin, Cibolo, McQueeney, Marion, Kingsbury, New Berlin, Zuehl, Geronimo, Nolte and Zipp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
